name: Equirium
description:
RTS game made from 08/24/2019 to 08/31/2019 for the community game jam.

Theme : "The game is a liar"

In Equirium, you manage the expansion of a colony using a resource called Equirium. In order to accomplish this, you must expand on the map and capture mines from the native inhabitants of the land.

There is a tutorial in game which tell you about what you need to know. To play this game "properly" you need about 10 minutes provided you don't die off right at the beginning :))
